DOC.brief_summary: The study aims to evaluate the molecular mechanism underlying the erythroid response observed in some patients with myelodysplasia, myelofibrosis and aplastic anemia treated with Deferasirox or Deferoxamina.
DOC.brief_title: Identification of Mechanism in the Erythroid Response in Patients With Myelodysplasia Undergoing Chelation Therapy
DOC.criteria: 1. Patients aged 18 and older 2. Diagnosis of Myelodysplasia, myelofibrosis or aplastic anemia 3. transfusiondependent anemia undergoing chelation therapy with deferasirox or deferoxamine
